name: set_attack_level
description: Sets the *attack level* of this <%= doc_class_name %>.
Valid values are any value between 1 and 5 (inclusive).

parameters.name: attack
parameters.desc: The **attack value** you want this <%= doc_class_name %> to have.

text: While these values don't affect their actual attack values, it's recommended to use get_attack_level() to determine the damage of their attacks, instead of only hard-coded values.
